services.homeLoanHeroTitle: Own your next home with certainty
services.homeLoanHeroDescription: Open Mortgage combines local expertise with broad lender access to match you with the loan that fits your goals.
services.homeLoanBenefitsTitle: We build plans that move you forward
services.homeLoanBenefitsSubtitle: Every application is unique, so we tailor the strategy and paperwork to your timeline.

tailored.title: Tailored borrowing plans
tailored.description: We layer deposit alternatives, product mix, and offset strategies into a clear pathway.

strategic.title: Strategic lender matching
strategic.description: We negotiate with our panel of banks and non-bank lenders to balance rates, fees, and flexibility.

holistic.title: Holistic support
holistic.description: From valuation to settlement, we keep you informed and advocate for your approval.

services.homeLoanProcessTitle: How we guide every home loan
services.homeLoanProcessSubtitle: You stay in control while we manage the details, paperwork, and lender relationships.
services.homeLoanSolutionsSubtitle: Pick the pathway that matches your story. We simplify the options and highlight what matters.
services.homeLoanSolutionsPrompt: Explore the full range of home loan products or reach out for a tailored recommendation.
services.homeLoanCtaTitle: Ready to build your mortgage story?
services.homeLoanCtaDescription: Book a call with our brokers or send us your property notes and weâ€™ll deliver a straight path forward.
services.carLoanHeroTitle: Drive away sooner with the right finance
services.carLoanHeroDescription: We help you find competitive car loan rates and flexible terms so you can get on the road faster.
services.carLoanBenefitsSubtitle: Fast approvals and tailored options to suit your budget and lifestyle.

speed.title: Fast Approvals
speed.description: Get approved quickly so you don't miss out on your dream car.

flexibility.title: Flexible Terms
flexibility.description: Choose repayment options that fit your budget and financial goals.

competitive.title: Competitive Rates
competitive.description: Access low interest rates from a wide network of trusted lenders.

services.carLoanSolutionsSubtitle: Whether it's for business or personal use, we have a loan solution for you.
services.carLoanSolutionsPrompt: Explore our range of car financing options designed to get you moving.

new.title: Personal Car Loan
new.description: Flexible financing for your personal vehicle purchase with competitive rates and terms.

used.title: Novated Lease
used.description: Salary packaging option that bundles your car lease, running costs, and maintenance into regular payments.

refinance.title: Car Loan Refinancing
refinance.description: Refinance your existing car loan to get a better rate or lower payments.

business.title: Business Car Loans
business.description: Tax-effective vehicle financing solutions for business owners.

services.carLoanCtaTitle: Ready to get behind the wheel?
services.carLoanCtaDescription: Contact us to discuss your car loan needs and get a personalized quote.
services.commercialLoanHeroDescription: Tailored financing solutions designed to support your business ambitions and operational needs.
services.commercialLoanBenefitsSubtitle: Strategic financing options to help you manage cash flow and seize opportunities.

growth.title: Business Growth
growth.description: Access capital to expand operations, hire staff, or enter new markets.

cashflow.title: Cash Flow Management
cashflow.description: Flexible solutions to smooth out revenue fluctuations and cover operational costs.

tax.title: Tax Efficiency
tax.description: Structure your loans to maximize potential tax benefits for your business.

services.commercialLoanSolutionsSubtitle: From property to equipment, we have the right loan for your business needs.
services.commercialLoanSolutionsPrompt: Browse our comprehensive range of commercial loan products.

property.title: Commercial Property
property.description: Purchase or refinance office, retail, or industrial property.

equipment.title: Equipment Finance
equipment.description: Upgrade machinery, vehicles, or technology without tying up capital.

lineOfCredit.title: Business Line of Credit
lineOfCredit.description: Flexible access to funds for day-to-day expenses and opportunities.

development.title: Development Finance
development.description: Funding for residential or commercial property development projects.

services.commercialLoanCtaTitle: Ready to take the next step?
services.commercialLoanCtaDescription: Connect with our commercial lending specialists to structure a deal that works for you.

step1.title: Search & Shortlist
step1.description: Discover us through our website and social media. Access blog posts, articles, and resources with valuable mortgage insights. We update interest rates weekly, allowing you to search and shortlist home loans.

step2.title: Expert Consultation
step2.description: Reach out for personalised advice and answers to your questions. Schedule a meeting with one of our experienced brokers to discuss your financial needs and goals.

step3.title: Application
step3.description: Ready to proceed? Complete and submit your application online. We'll handle all the paperwork for you.

step4.title: Tracking & Updating
step4.description: Stay informed with regular updates about your application status. We'll manage correspondence with the lender and keep you updated throughout the process.

step5.title: Closing
step5.description: We'll prepare all the necessary documents for you to review and sign. Receive your loan funds and complete your mortgage transaction smoothly.

step6.title: Post-Closing
step6.description: Our support continues even after closing. We offer ongoing assistance with tax, accounting, and insurance, and help you explore refinancing options or additional financial services as your needs evolve.

resources.repaymentCalculatorHeroDescription: Estimate your monthly mortgage repayments to understand what fits your budget before you apply.
resources.repaymentCalculatorInputSubtitle: Adjust the values to see how different rates and terms affect your repayments.
resources.repaymentCalculatorResultsSubtitle: This is an estimate only. Interest rates and fees may vary.
resources.repaymentCalculatorCtaTitle: Ready to take the next step?
resources.repaymentCalculatorCtaDescription: Speak to a broker to get a precise assessment of your borrowing capacity.
resources.stampDutyCalculatorHeroDescription: Stamp duty rates vary across states and change frequently. We provide links to official government calculators to ensure you get the most accurate and up-to-date estimates for NSW, VIC, QLD, and other states.
resources.stampDutyCalculatorInputSubtitle: Choose your state, property type, and concessions to see a rough duty estimate.
resources.stampDutyCalculatorResultsSubtitle: Based on current state rates plus any available concessions.

stampDutyCalculatorResults.disclaimer: Figures are estimates only, based on standard {state} rates. Confirm the exact amount with a conveyancer.

resources.stampDutyCalculatorCtaDescription: Our brokers can review concessions, surcharges, and any government relief so you understand the total upfront cost.

loanProducts.title: Loan Products
loanProducts.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive range of loan products to suit various needs and circumstances.

residential.title: Residential Loan
residential.description: Flexible financing for buying your first home, upgrading, or investing in residential property.

commercial.title: Commercial Loan
commercial.description: Tailored solutions for purchasing office, retail, or industrial spaces for your business.

construction.title: Construction Loan
construction.description: Progressive drawdowns to fund your building project or major renovation.

smsf.title: SMSF Loan
smsf.description: Leverage your self-managed super fund to invest in residential or commercial property.

nonResidential.title: Non-Residential Loan
nonResidential.description: Specialized lending for non-standard property types and unique investment purposes.

assetFinance.title: Asset Finance & Equipment Loan
assetFinance.description: Fund vehicles, machinery, and technology to keep your business moving.

home.title: Open Mortgage Solutions
home.subtitle: Your trusted partner for smart financing solutions.

welcome.title: Welcome to Open Mortgage
welcome.content: At Open Mortgage, we are committed to providing exceptional financial solutions tailored to your unique needs. With years of experience in the mortgage industry, our team of experts is dedicated to helping you achieve your property and financial goals.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our experienced professionals are here to guide you through every step.

bestRates.title: Best Rates
bestRates.description: We work with multiple lenders to find you the best rates available.

fastApproval.title: Fast Approval
fastApproval.description: Quick and efficient loan processing to get you approved faster.

personalizedService.title: Personalized Service
personalizedService.description: Tailored solutions designed specifically for your financial situation.

lenders.title: Our Lenders
lenders.description: We partner with leading financial institutions to provide you with the best loan options.
